text: Gérard Antoine Gaston Vignoble (29 October 1945 – 22 August 2022) was a French politician. He was a member of the Centre of Social Democrats. He was in the National Assembly from 1988 to 1997 and again from 2002 to 2007. Vignoble died in Dinard, France on 22 August 2022 at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French mayors
title: Gérard Vignoble
